text: Eric Haydock (born Eric John Haddock; 3 February 1943 â€“ 5 January 2019) was a British musician. He was best known as the original bass guitarist of The Hollies from December 1962 until July 1966. Haydock died on 5 January 2019, at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2019 deaths Category:British bass guitarists Category:Musicians from Cheshire
title: Eric Haydock
